io.sphere.sdk.facets

Interface SelectFacet<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the resource for this facet (e.g. ProductProjection)
    All Superinterfaces:
    Facet<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SelectFacetImpl

    public interface SelectFacet<T>
extends Facet<T>
    Facet that contains a list of selectable options.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<FacetOption> getAllOptions()
      Gets the complete options without limitations.
      java.util.Optional<io.sphere.sdk.search.TermFacetResult> getFacetResult()
      Gets the associated term facet result for this select facet.
      java.util.Optional<java.lang.Long> getLimit()
      Gets the limit for the maximum amount of options allowed to be displayed in the facet.
      java.util.List<FacetOption> getLimitedOptions()
      Obtains the truncated options list according to the defined limit.
      FacetOptionMapper getMapper()
      Gets the mapper for this facet.
      java.util.Optional<java.lang.Long> getThreshold()
      Gets the threshold indicating the minimum amount of options allowed to be displayed in the facet.
      boolean isMatchingAll()
      Defines whether the results should match all selected values in the facet (AND operator effect) or just at least one selected value (OR operator effect)
      boolean isMultiSelect()
      Defines whether multiple options can be selected or only one.
      SelectFacet<T> withSearchResult(io.sphere.sdk.search.PagedSearchResult<T> searchResult)
      Gets a new instance of Facet with the same attributes as this, but with the facet result extracted from the given search result.

      • Methods inherited from interface io.sphere.sdk.facets.Facet

        getFacetedSearchExpression, getKey, getLabel, getSearchModel, getSelectedValues, getType, isAvailable, isCountHidden

    • Method Detail

      • getAllOptions

        java.util.List<FacetOption> getAllOptions()
        Gets the complete options without limitations.
        Returns:
        the complete possible options

      • getLimitedOptions

        java.util.List<FacetOption> getLimitedOptions()
        Obtains the truncated options list according to the defined limit.
        Returns:
        the truncated options if the limit is defined, the whole list otherwise

      • getThreshold

        java.util.Optional<java.lang.Long> getThreshold()
        Gets the threshold indicating the minimum amount of options allowed to be displayed in the facet.
        Returns:
        the threshold for the amount of options that can be displayed, or absent if it has no threshold

      • getLimit

        java.util.Optional<java.lang.Long> getLimit()
        Gets the limit for the maximum amount of options allowed to be displayed in the facet.
        Returns:
        the limit for the amount of options that can be displayed, or absent if it has no limit

      • isMultiSelect

        boolean isMultiSelect()
        Defines whether multiple options can be selected or only one.
        Returns:
        true if multiple values can be selected, false otherwise

      • isMatchingAll

        boolean isMatchingAll()
        Defines whether the results should match all selected values in the facet (AND operator effect) or just at least one selected value (OR operator effect)
        Returns:
        true if results should match all selected values, false otherwise

      • getFacetResult

        java.util.Optional<io.sphere.sdk.search.TermFacetResult> getFacetResult()
        Gets the associated term facet result for this select facet.
        Returns:
        the term facet result, or absent if there is no associated facet result

      • getMapper

        FacetOptionMapper getMapper()
        Gets the mapper for this facet.
        Returns:
        the facet option mapper

      • withSearchResult

        SelectFacet<T> withSearchResult(io.sphere.sdk.search.PagedSearchResult<T> searchResult)
        Description copied from interface: Facet
        Gets a new instance of Facet with the same attributes as this, but with the facet result extracted from the given search result.
        Specified by:
        withSearchResult in interface Facet<T>
        Parameters:
        searchResult - the search result containing the new facet result
        Returns:
        a new instance with same attributes, but with the given facet result
